page.title: 10 FEATHER'S CARAVAN SITE
page.content: Feather's Caravan Site is situated on the north side of Whitley Bay. The site was used as a P.O.W. camp in the Second World War and then as a Territorial Army barracks before the caravan site was opened in 1960. It is 13 hectares in size and has 525 caravans, some of which can house 8 people. Prices range from 45-125 pounds per week for hiring. 86% of visitors are local(within a 20 mile radius),out of approx. 20,000 visitors per year. The site is at its fullest during July and August, and at other times during school holidays. Facilities available on site include 2 clubs, a swimming pool, an amusement arcade, a supermarket, a playground, a hairdresser, a laundrette, a chip shop, a nurse and a bingo hall.
